about.description: Sarvam AI focuses on the development and deployment of generative artificial intelligence (AI) technologies within the research and development sector. It offers creating large-language models tailored to India's linguistic languages and provides an enterprise-grade platform for the development and evaluation of generative AI applications. It primarily serves the technology sector. It was founded in 2023 and is based in Bengaluru, India.

newsMentions.article: Startup Policy Forum Launches IndiaAI in Action Podcast in Partnership with IndiaAI Mission to Showcase how India's leading startups are applying Artificial Intelligence (AI) to solve industry challenges. The podcast features guests from various sectors, sharing their experiences and insights on the evolving AI landscape in India.

Think global, act local: The launch of the India-specific GPT-Go is a bold move to unlock the Indian market and a calculated bet on the future of AI in the country. By tailoring the model to local languages and context, the company aims to address the unique needs of Indian users and businesses, potentially gaining a competitive edge.
